constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 19 (Tuesday, February 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KELLY of Pennsylvania:
H.R. 705.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has authority to extend protection to unborn
children with a detectable heartbeat under the Constitution's
grants of powers to Congress under the Equal Protection, Due
Process, and Enforcement Clauses of the Fourteenth Amendment
[Page H280]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Heartbeat Protection Act of 2021
